title: Players may need short pre-season before Premier League resumes - Pedro
description: Players may need a short pre-season to readjust when the Premier League resumes after the coronavirus pandemic, says Chelsea forward Pedro.
content:
Pedro joined Chelsea in August 2015
Players may need a short pre-season to readjust when the Premier League resumes after the coronavirus pandemic, says Chelsea forward Pedro.
Elite football in England has been suspended until at least 30 April because of t… [+2016 chars]
